    This lock allows serializing the incoming events from possible multiple clients, e.g.: if two clients connect at almost the same time, only one (the first) will have the NumPlayerRequest event.

  • Field Details

    • serverApp

      private final ServerApp serverApp
      The server application.

    • endSent

      private volatile int endSent
      Attribute that counts how many FinalRankings the server has sent.

    • toDelete

      private ArrayList<String> toDelete
      List of players to be deleted from the main list.

    • PING_INTERVAL

      public static final int PING_INTERVAL
      Attribute representing how often the server pings the clients (in milliseconds).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • controller

      public final Controller controller
      The controller of MVC pattern.

    • logger

      public Logger logger
      The logger.

    • lock_update

      private Object lock_update
      This lock allows serializing the incoming events from possible multiple clients, e.g.: if two clients connect at almost the same time, only one (the first) will have the NumPlayerRequest event.

    • lock_end

      private Object lock_end
      This lock allows the synchronization of the endSent attribute incrementation.

    • clients

      private final HashMap<String,Client> clients
      Hash map that links a nickname to its specific client instance. Notice that, in case of a disconnection and then a rejoining, the particular instance changes.

    • disconnectedClients

      public final List<String> disconnectedClients
      List of nicknames that have been disconnected from the game.
